Title: Error message discloses existence of file in write-only share

CWE.name: Information Exposure Through an Error Message

Description: Due to an error in the application logic an adversary with access to a write-only share may enumerate the names of existing files and subfolders by comparing the exception messages.
ActionTaken: The error in the application logic has been addressed.
Resolution: It is recommended that all instances are upgraded to Nextcloud 9.0.55 or 10.0.2.
